# Memory II

```{r, cache=FALSE}
word_count <- wordcountaddin::word_count("C9_Memory_II.Rmd")
wpm <- 200
reading_time <- paste0(round(word_count/wpm, 1), " minutes")
info <- data.frame(word_count,reading_time)
colnames(info) <- c("Word Count","Reading Time")
knitr::kable(info)
```
